mapper.sql: id, job_name, cron, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, is_open,job_type
mapper.insert: insert into "dpp_job_scheduled" (id,job_name, cron, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, is_open,job_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},#{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into "dpp_job_scheduled"
job_id,
cron,
created_by,
created_at,
updated_by,
updated_at,
is_open,
job_type,
#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{isOpen,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},

mapper.update:
update "dpp_job_scheduled"
job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
job_type = #{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update "dpp_job_scheduled" set job_Name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, job_type = #{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT job_name FROM dpp_job_list WHERE enable_schedule = TRUE AND job_name NOT IN ( SELECT job_name FROM dpp_job_scheduled )
